tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thank you so much Maam. We are very happy to find such a friendly doctor as she will ask very politely and she will answer each and every question with patience. Anytime she is there to help us and she is very professional and treats well. Best part here is Doctor cares for baby s future also along with mother. Once again thank you so much madam. I strongly recommend everyone to consult the doctor..Thank you once again

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After waiting for almost 30 mins, I was hardly checked for half a minute without any proper explanation..was asked if I was a working women ***** * ********** **** ***** ** ** *** **** *** ****** Well, I was refered ro radiologist for which I had to come after 2 hours.. However, the usg was just done in less a 30 secs ******* The receptionist made me wait again for long and the amount to be paid is discussed through in secret without proper bill in place. The most hurting part is the doctor stays upstairs and did not review my report.. When I asked the receptionist I was informed agin to come after 2 hours in heavy rain for which I refused . The shocking part is I was made to pay Rs 2500 plus 500 for a breast usg which did not even last a total of a minute and still unsatisied a patients apprenshion. ** ****** *********** *** no value for my money paid . ***** ********* *** * ******* **** ****** ******** *** ****** ** **** *** ******** ***** *** * **** ********* The doctor dint even pick my call to clarify my doubt. Request proper infrastrature in place. ***** * *** *** *** *** ***** ************* * ***** **** ** ***** ******* *** **** ***** ** * ****** ******
reply_text:
Sorry to hear  you  were not happy with the service provided 
The  duration  of examination depends on the problem and a recorded 10 min(cross checked with cam ) was  sufficient i think.Coming to the cost we here do not force any  one to get the investigation here.you are free to decide  it for yourself.
Wanted to know the kind of work you do as excessive work to the chest can be expressed  as breast pain.

review: I have had a bad experience with Dr. Subha. ***** ** ******* ** **** ** * ***** ****** *** **** ********* ***** *** ******** For every weekly follow ups, she charges consultation fee i.e.,Rs 500. Also the test which the clinic charges is double the amount compared to other labs. We stopped going to her as we did not get a positive vibe. And forget about calling her, no matter how important it is,because that hardly bothers her. * ***** ****** **** *** * ****** ** ******* **** **** ** *** *** ***** Very very sad to have thought of her for my wife. Loss of time and money.  *** *** *** **** **** ******* ************** I donot recommend Dr.Subha to any of my well wishers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi I'm SURESH. Y I'm giving review is . I had been many hospital for my wife pregnancy check .. every 3 months abortion happened. . 

So one of my friend suggested this hospital.. the day I went I met staff and doctor DR.SHUBA madam, she is the most experienced doctor. She will tel what is the exact problem and she gives right treatment..

What ever you spending money each n 1 rupees also worthy..
So finally my wife gave a birth to boy baby.. now both mom and baby also health..

Finally I always say thanks to Dr.shuba madam
Anusha and Prema.. ( when ever we call they will answer our questions )

I strongly recommend this hospital who is unhappy with other hopstial.. .

Thanks      . .
